name: Chairs
description:
Created for MakeAThing jam September 2017 using keywords: Prolong, Staccato and Mass. Stay within a safe zone before each rounds end or be eliminated, but beware as safezones have a player limit. Dash to knock opponents back and fight for control of the safezones.

Dev Notes:
'Prolong' led us down  the path of survival based mechanics and to use musical chairs as a model. 'Staccato' influenced the way we wanted to pace the game's short rounds and 'mass' was worked into the physics based movement and collision.

Currently requires xbox 360 controllers to play.

Contributors:

Ashley Stevens - Game Design

Luke Wilmot - Programming

Tylah Kapa - Programming
